content.text: I play the drums and I wish my spouse could work less so we could spend more time together.
Oh that's cool! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play alternative music and I really enjoy the drums because it lets me express myself.
That's awesome! What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is Twenty One Pilots because they have a really unique sound and I like their lyrics.
Oh I've heard of them! They're really good. What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the beach and I like to try new restaurants. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love going to the beach too. I'm a mother of 2 daughters and I love spending time with them.
That's great! I love kids. Do you have any hobbies that you like to do with your kids?
I like to take them to the park and we also like to go swimming. I also like to play games with them.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure your kids love it when you spend time with them.
They do! They're my whole world.
That's great! I'm glad you're so close to your kids.
